summary: Party map application with date filtering functionality
architectural_notes: Map displays party/event data filtered by date
Default view shows current day's data

existing_features.title: Set the map date range filter to default to today's date (both 'from' and 'to' set to current date) when the MapPage initially loads
Add a search button next to the date range inputs that triggers the map data filter when clicked

new_feature_requests.summary: Map should show today's parties by default on load
Add search button to filter map data by selected date

projectName: Default map to today's data with search button
